name: Metroverse
description: MET is the native utility token that fuels the Metroverse ecosystem, passively generated daily by staking city blocks. MET is a standard ERC-20 token on Ethereum and is be used as the in-game currency. As a utility token, users will use MET to strategically collect, trade and grow their in-game assets using various mechanics as the game matures. As far as Metroverse and its team is concerned, the only purpose MET serves is in-game utility.
